definition: to file an income tax return/to declare dutiable goods (at customs)
to declare to customs or to the taxman
a tax return/a tax declaration form

sentences.english: At tax-filing time, do you have to search for all the bills and important documents?
sentences.chinese: 在報稅時間，你是否要搜尋所有的賬單和重要文件？

sentences.english: I am an international student and I do not have social secuirty number. Can I do income tax return?
sentences.chinese: 我是一名國際學生，我沒有工卡號，我能報稅嗎？

sentences.english: How long does it take to get through customs?
sentences.chinese: 海關人員問我是否有要報稅的東西。

sentences.english: Tomorrow I'll head for the tax bureau firstly to declare for new employees.
sentences.chinese: 明天我將直接去稅局爲新員工報稅。

sentences.english: I forget to file my taxes and now I have to pay the fine for being late.
sentences.chinese: 我忘了報稅，現在我得爲了遲繳而付罰緩。

sentences.english: The Romans had a Censuses every 14 years for taxation purposes.
sentences.chinese: 每14年羅馬政府爲報稅緣故舉行人口調查。

sentences.english: Does not need to declare goods completes each month's profit table to be possible the enterprise interior to use.
sentences.chinese: 不用報稅做好每月的利潤表就可以企業內部用。

sentences.english: I forgot to file my taxes and now I have to pay the fine for being late.
sentences.chinese: 我忘了報稅，現在我得爲了遲繳而付罰款。

sentences.english: Hong Kong company from establish from day, need a next year to review a tax reporting annually.
sentences.chinese: 香港公司自成立日起，每年需要一次年審報稅。

sentences.english: As tax season approaches this year, even more people may  resort to cheating.
sentences.chinese: 今年的報稅季節將近，以致更多的人會選擇偷稅漏稅。

sentences.english: Tomorrow I will go directly to tax bureau to pay taxes for new staff.
sentences.chinese: 明天我將直接去稅局爲新員工報稅。

sentences.english: In addition, you will need your tax returns from the past year.
sentences.chinese: 此外，您將需要您的報稅表，從過去的一年。

sentences.english: We ought to allow businesses to defer taxes on the equipment they buy next year.
sentences.chinese: 我們應該允許企業對明年購買的設備延期報稅。

sentences.english: I interned with an accounting firm during tax season.
sentences.chinese: 我層在報稅季節在一家會計公司實習過。

sentences.english: As tax season approaches this year, even more people may resort to cheating.
sentences.chinese: 今年的報稅季節將近，以致更多的人會選擇偷稅漏稅。

definition: to pay/to hand over (tax payment etc)
to report (to the authorities)/to declare (to customs)
to fill in a form/to write data in a box (on a questionnaire or web form)
